content: To South Korea, free travel is still the first choice. Because I can go to some niche attractions, although I can't say that I can see the social state, I can see the different scenery of South Korea and eat more authentic Korean snacks. niche attractions are more attractive.

Guangtong Bridge is one of the eight scenic spots of Qingxichuan, not far from Qingxi Square at the source of Qingxichuan. In the daytime, whether walking on the bridge or under the bridge, you can see many sculptures of Xiangyun and other patterns on the bridge stone. At night, in the neon, there are toy touting, portrait painting stalls, and another casual atmosphere.

Guangtong Bridge is an ancient bridge on Qingxichuan, originally a earth bridge in the Korean period. When the Seoul Municipal Government ruled Qingxichuan in 2003, it moved the Guangtong Bridge to the upper reaches of Qingxichuan, considering the convenience of passage. Now this is the place where visitors have to visit.

The bridge is located in the middle of the city center of Seoul. It was originally a earth bridge in the Korean period. After the floods, Taizong (the third king of Korea) was rebuilt with stone for 10 years (1410). After the restoration, the Seoul Municipal Government repaired the bridge. In the 2003 restoration project of Qingxichuan, the Guangtong Bridge was moved to the upper reaches, and the original site was built as a Guangtong Bridge. When the Guangtong Bridge was restored, the stones with the statues of God were also restored. Now it has become a popular resting place for citizens, especially in the middle of the Qingxichuan Bridge, not only can you feel a quaint, but also because the bridge is a pedestrian bridge, it is prohibited from passing vehicles, so it is very convenient for pedestrians. Every year, there are activities such as re-stepping the Guangtong Bridge on the 15th of the first month, and citizens participate in the enthusiasm. In addition, there is a food alley nearby, where you can have large flowers. Now Qingxichuan has a walkway, and citizens can take a walk while enjoying the scenery of Qingxichuan. Guangtong Bridge has become one of the most beautiful landscapes in the "Qingxi 8 Views".
Cheonggyecheon Gwangtong Bridge - stop by when you take a walk in Cheonggyecheon

A bridge on the Cheonggyechwa is very close to the bustling business district of Myeongdong and only a few minutes walk away. The stream is very clear and not very urgent. Seoul citizens are happy to play and play in the stream. However, for foreign tourists, it may not be attractive enough. After all, most of the tourists passing through here are still aiming at Myeongdong Commercial Center.
